ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
ygData.msgSnippet: As soon as Prowl ducked his head, Megatron let his feet leave the ground, slipping through Prowl s grasp, as he countered gravity, keeping himself hovered

Subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
References: <3BD49208.8D7467E7@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

As soon as Prowl ducked his head, Megatron let his feet leave the
ground, slipping through Prowl's grasp, as he countered gravity, keeping
himself hovered slightly above ground. Then he drove his right knee up
as fast as he could at the ducking Prowl, to catch him in the face.
